componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: This Bid has been closed because the RFP activities have completed but the Opportunity is still open. You can find the latest information there.

componentInstanceProperties.name: messageBody
componentInstanceProperties.value: The Opportunity has a Pending Approval Request and so this Bid is locked until the request is Approved/Rejected.
